Tao 2006
==================

Under *Tao 2006*, *punctilious* formalizes the theories described in :cite:`tao_2006_analysis_i{Analysis I}` .

One :ref:`theory-elaboration-sequence` is provided per chapter in the original book.

.. toctree::
   :titlesonly:
   :caption: Book chapters

   The Peano axioms<tao_2006/the_peano_axioms>
